about_the_game:
Bombox is a fast-paced casual puzzle game.

* Gameplay: Identify and remove the correct bomb wires before the countdown ends on the bomb box.
* Multiple Mechanics: As you progress through the levels, more gameplay mechanics will be unlocked, including but not limited to multiple bomb boxes, branching and intersecting wires.
* Multiple Solutions: Unlike typical puzzle games that may halt progress if you can't find the solution, this game allows for discovering solutions through trial and error.
* Levels: The first version comes with 50+ levels, with plans to add more in the future.

This game is the work of a solo indie developer, and continuous updates and optimizations are planned based on your feedback and comments. Enjoy the challenge!

discard https://discord.gg/h8jaRmFc

name: Bombox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: 2 Ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Radeon X1300/NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT/Intel HD 3000 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
